articles.title: Military Parade, Public Procession Mark 105th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Military Parade, Public Procession Mark 105th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A military parade and a public procession of Pyongyang citizens celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung took place with splendor at Kim Il Sung Square Saturday.
					 Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, appeared in the tribune of honor of the square.
					
					 The tribune of honor were taken by Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, chairmen of the provincial party committees, commanding officers of the Korean People's Army and others.
					
					 Reviewing stands of the square were occupied by delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of the President, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel and merited people, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas Koreans and other overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and their wives, members of the military attaches corps here and their wives, staff members of foreign embassies here, and foreign guests.
					
					 The guard of honor and military band of the KPA conducted a starting ceremony. 
					
					 The flags of the DPRK and the WPK were hoisted amid the playing of the National Anthem and the song "Fly High, Our Party Flag".
					
					 The DPRK minister of the People's Armed Forces informed the respected Supreme Leader of the start of the military parade celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A 21-gun salute boomed amid the playing of "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il."
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 The speaker upon authorization of Kim Jong Un extended thanks to all the party members, service personnel and civilians who have successfully carried into practice the pledges they made before the great leaders without an inch of deflection and concession and with the firm conviction in the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He called upon all the party members, service personnel, youths and working people to further accelerate a drive for creating the Mallima speed and thus build the best country of the people, fully developed socialist power.
					
					 The U.S. is creating the phase of a war while resorting to frantic nuclear war provocation moves against the DPRK, the speaker said, stressing that if it makes reckless provocation, the Korean revolutionary armed forces will immediately mount an annihilating blow and answer an all-out war in kind and a nuclear war with Korean-style nuclear strike.
					
					 Cars carrying the flags bearing images of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il entered the square, escorted by general and other officers of the KPA.
					
					 The guards of honor of the KPA Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and all the participants in the military parade paid deep respects to the flags.
					
					 As the military parade began, the columns of marchers representing the periods of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, the building of regular armed forces and the Fatherland Liberation War passed the square.
					
					 Then, led by a column of Seoul Guards 3rd Infantry Division, the columns of Seoul Kim Chaek Guards 4th Infantry Division, Kang Gon Guards 2nd Infantry Division, Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division, Guards 2nd Surface Ship Flotilla, Guards 56th Kim Ji Sang Heroic Pursuit Plane Regiment and other guards units entered the square.
					
					 Marching past the square following them were columns of the navy, air force and anti-air force, strategic force, special operation force, the 1st, 2nd, 4th and 5th corps and other combined units and columns of infantry divisions of the first echelons of frontline corps including the 46th Infantry Division of the KPA.
					
					 They were followed by the columns of Kim Il Sung Military University, Kim Il Sung University of Politics, Kim Jong Il Military Postgraduate Institute, Kim Jong Suk Naval University and those of military academies at all levels such as Kim Chaek University of Air Force, Kang Kon Military Academy and O Jin U Artillery Academy.
					
					 Columns of Mangyongdae Revolutionary School, Kang Pan Sok Revolutionary School and Nampho Revolutionary School passed through the square.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un acknowledged the columns marching past shouting cheers of "hurrah!"
					
					 The columns of Worker-Peasant Red Guards and columns of the Young Red Guards in Pyongyang and all provinces, and universities such as Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology followed.
					
					 Fighter formation flew the sky above the square, making letters reading "105" and setting off fireworks.
					
					 Columns of tanks, armored vehicles, artillery pieces, rockets of services and strategic force rolled past the square.
					
					 As the military band proceeded, fighter formation left the five-color trail of a fan shape, decorating the closing of the parade.
					
					 Then followed a public procession of Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 After the mass demonstration, Kim Jong Un walked to the balcony of the tribune of honor to wave to the enthusiastically cheering crowds.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday, the Day of the Sun.
					Accompanying him were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, and the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was laid at the statues.
					
					Also placed were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and a floral basket in the joint name of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					Kim Jong Un, together with other visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					Then he entered the hall where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					He paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					He looked round the hall where orders Kim Il Sung received are on display and halls which house a train coach and car used by him.
					
					He entered the hall where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					He paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence for him.
					
					He went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display and halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order to Promote Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order to Promote Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un issued an order to promote military ranks of KPA commanding officers on April 14, the eve of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 According to the order, Ri Yong Gil and So Hong Chan were promoted to army general, Wi Song Il, Pang Tu Sop, Ri Song Guk, Yang Tong Hun, Kim Yong Bok, Kim Myong Nam, Jo Nam Jin, Jang Kil Song, Song Jun Sol and Kim Chol Gyu to army colonel general, Rim Kwang Il, Kim Jong Sik, Ri Yong Chol, Kim Kwang Hyok and Ma Won Chun to army lieutenant general, and Kang Su to army major general.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed belief that the KPA commanding officers would as ever get more firmly united under the banner of the Party Central Committee as befitting the descendents of President Kim Il Sung and soldiers and disciples of leader Kim Jong Il, and thus fulfill the mission and duty they assumed before the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Evening Gala of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Evening Gala of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- An evening gala of youth and students "We Will Glorify Great Kim Il Sung's Korea Forever" took place at Kim Il Sung Square on Saturday in celebration of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Among those who took the tribune of honor were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party and chairpersons of provincial party committees.
					
					 Reviewing stands of the square were taken by delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of the President, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, merited people, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas Koreans and other overseas compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations, members of the military attaches corps here and their spouses, staff members of foreign embassies here, and foreign guests.
					
					 Amid the playing of music "Let's Sing of the Day of the Sun", cheerful dances were performed.
					
					 Various acrobatic pieces were shown and the square was full of joy and optimism of youths and students.
					
					 Overseas Koreans and foreign guests joined the dancers to gorgeously decorate the evening.

articles.title: Banquet Arranged to Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Banquet Arranged to Celebrate Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Banquets for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung were given at the Mokran House, the People's Palace of Culture, Okryu, Chongryu restaurants, Full-service Ship Mujigae, Floating Restaurant Taedonggang, etc. on Saturday.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, delegates to the celebrations of the Day of the Sun.
					
					 Invited to it were members of congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas Koreans, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, representatives of foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here, military attaches of foreign embassies and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Myong Su and O Su Yong made speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the whole life of the President was a sacred revolutionary life of an outstanding genius of the revolution and peerlessly elder statesman who devoted his all to the final victory of Korean-style socialism and global independence and performed immortal feats before the era and history, shouldering the destiny of the country and the revolution and mankind.
					
					 They called for holding President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche forever and speeding up the victorious advance of socialism to fulfill the mission and duty as descendants, soldiers and disciples of the great leaders.
					
					 They stressed the need to carry through the Juche-based line of national reunification set forth by the great leaders in order to build a reunified power on this land at any cost and carry on the dynamic struggle for the victory of the human cause of independence in firm solidarity with the progressives of the world in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Performances Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Performances Celebrate Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th April Spring People's Art Festival gave performances at theaters and cultural houses here on Saturday to celebrate the Day of the Sun.
					 Enjoying the performances were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, delegates to the celebrations of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, citizens and school youth and children.
					
					 The performers put on the stages colorful art pieces like vocal, dance and instrumental music.
					
					 In mixed quartet "Song of Mangyongdae" and other numbers they sang high praises of the undying exploits of the President who built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence in Korea with his distinguished idea and leadership and great revolutionary practices.
					
					 They well represented such numbers as mixed duo "This Is Thanks to the Songun Politics of General" and male quintet "Thinking of the General" to make the audience recall with deep emotion the revolutionary career of leader Kim Jong Il who made devotion under the Songun politics for the country and the people.
					
					 The performances showed the high honor and happiness of the Korean people blessed with the illustrious leaders and the party as they uphold respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in the van of the party and the revolution. 
					
					 Some pieces reflected the heroic struggle and life of the people and national character.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Moldovan Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Moldovan Party Delegation
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Saturday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Socialist Party of Moldova led by Vice-Chairman of its National Council Grigore Novac which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Participants in Military Parade Welcomed by Pyongyangites
articles.content:
Participants in Military Parade Welcomed by Pyongyangites
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The participants in the military parade, who celebrated the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung in the presence of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, passed through streets of the capital city, warmly welcomed by tens of thousands of Pyongyang citizens Saturday.
					 The array of trucks with the participants in the military parade aboard, led by flags bearing the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, crawled through the streets in Pyongyang such as Yonggwang Street, Chollima Street, Yongung Street, Pipha Street, Sungri Street and University Street.
					
					 Pyongyang citizens warmly welcomed them along the route extending scores of kilometers, presenting bouquets and flowers.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing hosted a reception on April 12 to celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Wang Jiarui, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, and officials concerned.
					
					 Charge d' Affaires ad Interim Pak Myong Ho and staff members of the embassy were on hand.
					
					 Pak in his speech referred to the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and to the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in a drive to create the Mallima speed under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed the stand to make joint efforts to strengthen the long-standing DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 Wang said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung is the great founder and leader of the Korean party, state and army.
					
					 He provided the Sino-DPRK friendship. He is always alive in the hearts of the two peoples.
					
					 We are convinced that the Korean people will make fresh successes in socialist construction by dynamically advancing with strenuous efforts, rallied closer around the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Chairman Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It is the steadfast policy of the Chinese party and government to steadily consolidate and develop the Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation, Wang said.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK embassy gave a reception for diplomatic envoys of various countries to China on April 10.

articles.title: Tablets to Honor Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
articles.content:
Tablets to Honor Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Tablets to honor President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were unveiled with due ceremony at Leningrad Metal Factory in Sankt-Peterburg City of Russia on April 10 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
					 Engraved on the tablets are Korean and Russian letters reading "Comrade Kim Il Sung, president of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, visited Leningrad Metal Factory on Oct. 24, 1961" and "Comrade Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited Leningrad Metal Factory on Aug. 6, 2001".
					
					 Present at the unveiling ceremony were the representative of the Foreign Ministry to Sankt-Peterburg Region and other personages and citizens of Russia and the DPRK ambassador to this country and officials concerned.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The speakers said it is a happy event for all the citizens and the city administration to unveil those tablets showing the feats of the great leaders, adding that the ceremony would mark a significant occasion in further consolidating the long-standing friendship between the two peoples.
					
					 They warmly congratulated all the Korean people on the 105th birth anniversary of the President and heartily hoped that all things would go well in the DPRK under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants in the ceremony laid a floral basket and bouquets before the tablets.

articles.title: Magic Festival Attracting Citizens
articles.content:
Magic Festival Attracting Citizens
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The on-going 5th April Spring People's Art Festival in Pyongyang comes to be conspicuous by the magic festival which draws many citizens.
					 Participated in the festival are experts and amateurs across the country.
					
					 The art squad of the Ministry of Railways put on stage illusionary jugglery "Mystery of Box", which leaves a favorable impression upon audience for its high ideological and artistic value.
					
					 Jang Kyong Ho, a student of Pyongyang University of Computer Science, took part in the festival with a common jugglery which successfully gives magical delineation of the pour of clothes and school bags from modern production bases built in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 Among jugglery pieces applauded by audience are those presented by the art squad of Ryanggang Province, the Nampho City Art Troupe and Yun Kyong, a student of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated Across Country
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Celebrated Across Country
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK significantly celebrate the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A large number of people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					
					 The visitors in humble reverence paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their smiling portraits.
					
					 Service personnel, civilians from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders and their smiling portraits on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang and other parts of the country and to pay homage to them.
					
					 An endless stream of visitors flew to the Mangyongdae, the birthplace of the President.
					
					 Looking round the mementoes preserved at the low-roofed thatched house in Mangyongdae, the visitors recalled the exploits of the President and the revolutionary careers of Mangyongdae family members.
					
					 Reverence for the President pervaded the venue of the 19th Kimilsungia Festival in Pyongyang and Kimilsungia exhibition halls in all provinces.
					
					 At photo exhibitions in the capital city and provinces, working people of various strata looked back upon the history of the President's revolutionary activities and the history of the DPRK which advanced along the road of prosperity under his leadership.
					
					 Performances of provincial art groups were given in Chongjin, Sariwon, Kanggye and other cities.
					
					 Celebration performances were also staged by working people and youth and students across the country.

articles.title: Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreigners, Overseas Koreans Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of missions of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here, delegations of political parties and delegations and delegates of Juche idea study groups from different countries, participants in the 19th Kimilsungia Festival, the congratulatory groups of Koreans in Japan and the General Association of Koreans in China for celebrating the Day of the Sun, family members of persons related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle from abroad and other foreign guests and overseas Koreans visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Saturday, the Day of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues at the palace.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by the great leaders for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their revolutionary lives. 
					
					 The chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and its members also visited the palace to pay tribute to the great leaders on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their smiling portraits displayed across the country on the occasion of the 105th birth anniversary of the President.
					 Seen before the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Placed there were floral baskets, together with bouquets and flowers, in the names of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, industrial establishments and schools at all levels.
					
					 Also laid was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statues of the great leaders.
					
					 Floral baskets were also placed before the statues and portraits of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts of the city.
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: Mexican Party Delegation Visits Birthplace of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Mexican Party Delegation Visits Birthplace of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico led by its national leader Alberto Anaya Gutierrez visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, Saturday.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round historic relics preserved there with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the Mangyongdae family members.
					
					 The delegation also visited the 19th Kimilsungia Festival and Ryomyong Street on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Celebrate Day of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Celebrate Day of Sun
 Hamhung, April 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Hungnam Port on Saturday, the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bunches of flowers at the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hamhung City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Attending the meeting were the captain and crew of the Panama-flagged ship DADE DUN HUA.
					
					 Speakers praised Kim Il Sung as the most prominent leader in the 20th century and peerlessly great man as he founded the immortal Juche idea and performed undying feats for the Korean revolution and human history.
					
					 They said that history knows no such a great man as the President who had taken warm care of the people, enjoying absolute support and trust from them and led the cause of independence against imperialism and the cause of socialism to victory all his life.
					
					 They stressed that the President would be always alive in the hearts of the world's progressives as he made gigantic contributions to the country and the people, the era and the history with his profound ideas and theories, unusual leadership ability and gigantic revolutionary practice.
					
					 A letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: First-term Camping Starts at Children's Camps in DPRK
articles.content:
First-term Camping Starts at Children's Camps in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- The first-term camping started in children's camps across the country on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A starting ceremony was held at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp on Saturday.
					
					 Its participants placed a floral basket and bunches of flowers at a mosaic depicting the image of President Kim Il Sung at the camp and paid tribute to him.
					
					 At the ceremony, speakers referred to their joy and happiness of having a pleasant camping life at the Mangyongdae Children's Camp splendidly remodeled under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They underlined the need for the campers to consolidate the knowledge they learned at schools and train their bodies and mind to be robust.
					
					 The first-term camping also started at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the December 6 Children's Camp in Kangwon Province, the Sokam Children's Camp and other children's camps across the country.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Saturday, the Day of the Sun.
					 The letter praised the 80 odd-year long life of President Kim Il Sung as the sacred life of the outstanding leader who led the cause of the Juche revolution to a shining victory with his extraordinary ideology and unusual leadership and noble virtue, and a peerless patriot who put the dignity and honor of the country and the nation on the highest level with his ardent love for the country, the nation and the people.
					
					 The President set forth the most reasonable policy and ways including the three charters for national reunification and powerfully aroused all the Koreans to the movement for national reunification and the great national unity, the letter said.
					
					 It pointed out that the sacred revolutionary life of the President and his undying feats will shine long along with the country, the nation, era and history.
					
					 It said that the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered by the President had covered the path of victories only as it was steered by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It noted that the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered by the President and led by Kim Jong Il has now ushered in the heyday of its development as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un
					
					 All the Koreans are confidently looking far into the bright morrow of the reunified country in the astonishing reality in the DPRK, the letter noted, stressing that the vanguard fighters and patriotic people of all social standings in the south are firmly determined to carry out the behests of the great Generalissimos for national reunification, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Great Man
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Great Man
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung in his lifetime had performed undying feats for the victorious advance of not only the Korean revolution but the human cause of independence. 
					 For that reason, statesmen who met the President highly praised him as the most prominent elder statesman, peerlessly great man in the 20th century.
					
					 In Juche 38 (1949), the President paid an official goodwill visit to the former Soviet Union.
					
					 At a banquet held by the party and state leaders of the former Soviet Union, Stalin in his toast lauded the President as a genuine revolutionary who led the 20 year-long anti-Japanese struggle to victory and devotedly defended the Soviet Union with arms from the invasion of imperialists in the East. And he said that the smooth socialist construction in the Soviet Union would have been unthinkable without the struggle of genuine revolutionaries like Kim Il Sung, and proposed warm applause to express thanks to him.
					
					 When the President visited China in April 1975, Mao Zedong earnestly asked him to lead the world, saying that the world revolution and international communist movement were placing hopes on him.
					
					 After being honored with the audience of Kim Il Sung during a visit to the DPRK in June 1994, former U.S. President Jimmy Carter was so fascinated by his personality as to say that Kim Il Sung is greater than that George Washington, Thomas Jefferson and Abraham Lincoln put together, eulogizing him as the great sun god of human destiny.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Central Standing Committee of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Saturday, the Day of the Sun.
					 April 15, Juche 1 (1912) when President Kim Il Sung was born was a day of great fortune for the nation on which the bright morning dawned for the country, and a day of great auspicious event for humankind on which the sun of the era of independence was greeted, the letter said.
					
					 It praised the President as an outstanding thinker and theoretician and a great man of action who indicated the road ahead of the times and the revolution with the immortal Juche idea and put the modern history on the orbit of independence, and a benefactor of the national resurrection and the founding father of socialist Korea who saved the destiny of the nation by defeating the two formidable imperialisms in one century and built a powerful country, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy  and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 It also praised the President as the savior of the life of the Koreans in Japan as he brought the joy of national liberation to the Koreans in Japan who were shedding bitter tears as members of stateless nation after being taken to Japan during the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea and put forward them as full-fledged overseas Koreans of Juche Korea.
					
					 It pointed out that the patriotic cause of Chongryon the origin of which was given by the President and which was steered by leader Kim Jong Il with his total dedication has now entered the phase of new development as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, and the history of warm love and blood ties the great Generalissimos forged with the Koreans in Japan are now given a steady continuity.
					
					 The letter said that all Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan will cherish the greatest fortune of being blessed by the illustrious leaders and the sun as they are led by Kim Jong Un, and the firm faith that the victory of the Juche cause, the patriotic cause of Chongryon, is science, and fully demonstrate the might of Chongryon along with the homeland making a victorious drive.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on April 15, the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The letter said that April 15, the birthday of the President, is the day of the greatest fortune when the Korean nation greeted its sun for the first time in its history spanning 5 000 years and a day of historical event which brought the dawn of the era of independence to the world progressives.
					
					 It noted that Kim Il Sung, who embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens, shouldering the destiny of the country and the nation, performed great immortal exploits on behalf of the country and the nation, times and history with his outstanding idea, rare leadership and noble virtue in the whole course of his revolutionary guidance.
					
					 It pointed out that the undying revolutionary idea and exploits of the President shined more brilliantly and there unfolded a new era of prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea on this land under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The letter stressed that thanks to Kim Jong Un, the cause of the Juche revolution pioneered and steered by the great Generalissimos are shedding its rays century after century and the sacred history of the sun is given steady continuity.
					
					 It expressed the will to consolidate the association, the patriotic legacy left by the great leaders, into the organization trusting and following Kim Jong Un only, and make a tangible contribution to the prosperity of the country by keeping pace with the people in the homeland all out in the general advance toward the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners.

articles.title: Korean Book, Photo and Craftwork Exhibition Held in Moscow
articles.content:
Korean Book, Photo and Craftwork Exhibition Held in Moscow
 Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A DPRK book, photo and craftwork exhibition opened with due ceremony in Moscow of Russia on April 6, ahead of the Day of the Sun.
					 Put up in front of its venue were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display at the exhibition were photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great leaders and the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works and books, photos and stamps introducing the DPRK and craftwork showing the wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were political and social figures, members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and those concerned of the press of Russia and the DPRK ambassador to this country and his embassy officials.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets at the portraits of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the ceremony Smirnova, chairman of the "People's General Council of Russia" who is deputy to the Russian Federation Council, referred to the exploits of President Kim Il Sung for the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly relations and the global peace.
					
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said that Kim Il Sung is founder of the DPRK and eternal leader of the Korean people and that it is a sacred duty of the Russian people, genuine friends of the Koreans, to splendidly celebrate his birth anniversary.
					
					 Koryakin, vice-chairman of the Regional Social Organization of Russia "Borozino", stressed that Korea's reunification, noble desire of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, would be surely realized before long under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exhibition lasts till April 17.

articles.title: Tienen lugar desfile militar y manifestacion multitudinaria por Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Tienen lugar desfile militar y manifestacion multitudinaria por Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 15 con solemnidad en esta capital el desfile militar y la manifestacion multitudinaria de capitalinos en celebracion del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					Salio a la tribuna Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Tambien, aparecieron en la tribuna Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los presidentes de los Comites Provinciales del Partido, los miembros de mando del EPC, etc. 
					
					En el palco estaban presentes los delegados a las festividades del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente, los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los ameritados, los miembros del grupo de felicitacion y delegaciones de compatriotas residentes en ultramar, los compatriotas en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y de los agregados militares, los integrantes de las embajadas, acreditados en Corea, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					Se realizo la ceremonia de comienzo de la guardia de honor y la banda militar general, del EPC. 
					
					En medio de la interpretacion del Himno Patriotico y la cancion "Flamea alto, bandera de nuestro Partido", se izaron la bandera nacional de la RPDC y la del PTC. 
					
					El ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares de la Republica informo al Maximo Dirigente el comienzo del desfile militar en celebracion del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente. 
					
					Se tiraron 21 salvas en medio de la interpretacion de la "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y la "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il". 
					
					Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC y del Comite Central del PTC, pronuncio el discurso de felicitacion. 
					
					Por el encargo del Maximo Dirigente, Choe dio agradecimiento a todos los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes que con la firme fe en la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, vinieron cumpliendo cabalmente sin ninguna concesion sus juramentos dados a los grandes Lideres antecesores.
					
					Llamaron a todos los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los jovenes y los trabajadores a avivar mas las llamas de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima para levantar una potencia socialista desarrollada integralmente, o sea, mejor paraiso del pueblo envidiado por todo el mundo. 
					
					EE.UU. crea una tirante coyuntura de guerra librando las fanaticas maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC, dijo y enfatizo que en el caso de que EE.UU. cometa una provocacion imprudente, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas le daran de inmediato el contraataque demoledor y responderan a la guerra total con la guerra total y a la guerra nuclear con el ataque nuclear a nuestro estilo. 
					
					Luego, entraron en la plaza las banderas con efigies de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa, escoltadas por los generales y oficiales del EPC. 
					
					Las guardias de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y todos los participantes en el desfile militar rindieron el mas sublime homenaje a los grandes Lideres antecesores.
					
					Al iniciar el desfile militar, marcharon por la plaza las columnas del periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa y del periodo de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas regulares, asi como las del periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Entraron las columnas de la Tercera Division Guardia de Infanteria "Seul", seguidas de las de la Cuarta Division Guardia de Infanteria "Seul" Kim Chaek, la Segunda Division Guardia de infanteria Kang Kon, la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su y otras unidades guardias.
					
					Y pasaron las columnas de las fuerzas navales, aereas y antiaereas, estrategicas y de operaciones especiales del EPC, las de Cuerpos No. 1, 2, 4, 5 y otras grandes unidades combinadas del EPC, las de divisiones de infanteria de escalon de primera linea de los cuerpos del frente incluso la Division de Infanteria 46. 
					
					Figuraban las columnas de la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung, la Academia Politica Kim Il Sung, el Instituto Militar Kim Jong Il y la Academia de Fuerzas Navales Kim Jong Suk, seguidas de las otras de academias militares a todos los niveles, entre otras, la Academia de las Fuerzas Aereas Kim Chaek, la Escuela General de Oficiales Kang Kon y la Escuela General de Oficiales Artilleros O Jin U.
					
					Aparecieron las columnas de la Escuela Revolucionaria de Mangyongdae, la Escuela Revolucionaria Kang Pan Sok y la Escuela Revolucionaria de Nampho. 
					
					El Maximo Dirigente respondio con mano alzada a las aclamaciones de "!Viva!" de las filas del desfile militar. 
					
					Marcharon la columna de esta capital y las provinciales del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino y las otras de la Guardia Roja Juvenil y de estudiantes de las universidades como la Universidad Kim Il Sung y la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek. 
					
					Los aviones de combate sobrevolaron la plaza formando el numero 105 y tirando las salvas. 
					
					Luego, atravesaron la plaza los tanques, carros blindados, artilleros, cohetes de cada tipo de ejercito y cohetes de fuerzas estrategicas. 
					
					Al marchar la banda militar, la escuadrilla de aviones adorno el fin del desfile militar con el vapor de diversos colores. 
					
					Seguidamente, hubo la manifestacion multitudinaria de capitalinos.
					
					Terminada la manifestacion multitudinaria, el Maximo Dirigente salio al balcon de la tribuna y respondio a las aclamaciones efusivas de las masas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan con motivo del Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia del Sol, Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia 15 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan y rindio homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					    Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, y otros cuadros responsables del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, los ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente entro en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Fue colocado ante las estatuas el cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Se depositaron tambien el cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Estado de la RPDC y el otro en nombre comun del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					Junto con los participantes, Kim Jong Un rindio homenaje al Presidente y al Dirigente ante sus estatuas de pie.
					
					En los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente y el Dirigente, el Maximo Dirigente volvio a hacerles reverencia.
					
					Y paso revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el Presidente y del vagon y carro, usados por el. Y estuvo tambien en las salas de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el Dirigente y del carro, el coche electrico, el barco y el vagon, utilizados por el.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes de EPC
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio el dia 14 la orden de ascender los grados militares de los comandantes del EPC, con motivo del 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					    Segun la orden, el grado del general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres fue otorgado a Ri Yong Gil y So Hong Chan; el de coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres a Wi Song Il, Pang Tu Sop, Ri Song Guk, Yang Tong Hun, Kim Yong Bok, Kim Myong Nam, Jo Nam Jin, Jang Kil Song, Song Jun Sol y Kim Chol Gyu; el de teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres a Rim Kwang Il, Kim Jong Sik, Ri Yong Chol, Kim Kwang Hyok y Ma Won Chun; y el de mayor general de las fuerzas terrestres a Kang Su. 
					
					    El Comandante Supremo expreso su confianza de que en el futuro tambien como en el pasado los comandantes del EPC cumpliran con su sagrado mision y deber atribuidos por la epoca y la revolucion uniendose compactamente en torno al Comite Central del Partido como descendientes del Presidente Kim Il Sung y soldados y discipulos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos festejan Dia del Sol
articles.content:
Jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos festejan Dia del Sol
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar por la noche del dia 15 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung la velada de los jovenes y estudiantes capitalinos "Hagamos perpetuas, gran Corea del Sol" en celebracion del 105o aniversario del dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Salieron a la tribuna Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo y los presidentes de los Comites Provinciales del Partido, etc.
					
					Se veian en el palco los delegados al acto conmemorativo por el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades de masas, ministerios e instituciones centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea,  los ameritados, los grupos de felicitacion y las delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en otros paises, los compatriotas en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales, los esposos de los agregados militares, los miembros de las embajadas, acreditados en la RPDC, y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					La velada se inicio con la interpretacion de la cancion "Cantemos el Dia del Sol".
					
					La plaza, donde se ofrecieron tambien varias piezas acrobaticas, estaba llena de la alegria y romanticismo de la juventud.
					
					Los compatriotas y los huespedes extranjeros tambien bailaron junto con los participantes.
					
					La velada llego al climax con la interpretacion de la cancion "Jubilo del pueblo".

articles.title: Ofrecidos banquetes en homenaje al natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Ofrecidos banquetes en homenaje al natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 15 de abril (ACNC) -- Se ofrecieron el dia 15 los banquetes por el 105o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung en la Casa Mokran, el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo, el Restaurante Okryu, el Chongryu, el barco de servicio combinado Mujigae, el barco-restaurante Taedonggang y otros lugares.
					Estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo y los delegados a los actos festivos por el Dia del Sol.
					
					Y fueron invitados los miembros de los grupos de felicitacion y las delegaciones de los compatriotas en ultramar, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista, los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y de las organizaciones internacionales y los esposos de los agregados militares, acreditados en la RPDC, y los huespedes extranjeros. 
					
					En los banquetes, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Ri Myong Su y O Su Yong hicieron uso de la palabra.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la vida del Presidente es la sagrada trayectoria de un genio de la revolucion y veterano politico sin par, quien encargandose del destino de la patria, la revolucion y la humanidad, dedico todo lo suyo para la victoria final del socialismo al estilo coreano y para la verificacion de la independencia en el mundo entero y realizo las proezas imperecederas ante la epoca y la historia.
					
					Destacaron la necesidad de enaltecer para siempre al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Sol del Juche y llevar adelante el socialismo para cumplir asi con la mision y deber como descendientes del Presidente y soldados y discipulos del Dirigente.
					
					Llamaron a levantar a toda costa una potencia reunificada en esta tierra materializando cabalmente la autoctona linea de reunificacion de la patria presentada por los grandes Lideres antecesores y luchar por el triunfo de la causa de la independencia de la humanidad uniendose compactamente con los pueblos progresistas del mundo bajo el ideal de independencia, paz y amistad.
